Vienna Malt.name: Vienna Malt
Vienna Malt.description: Increases malty flavor, provides balance. Use in Vienna, Märzen and Oktoberfest.

White Wheat Malt.name: White Wheat Malt
White Wheat Malt.description: Imparts a malty flavor. For American wheat beers, wheat bock and doppel bock.

Victory Malt.name: Victory Malt
Victory Malt.description: Provides a deep golden to brown color. Use in nut brown ales, IPAs and Scottish ales.

Dextrin Malt (carapils).name: Dextrin Malt (carapils)
Dextrin Malt (carapils).description: Balances body and flavor without adding color, aids in head retention. For any beer.

Black Barley.name: Black Barley
Black Barley.description: Imparts dryness. Unmalted; use in porters and dry stouts.

Crystal Malt 10°.name: Crystal Malt 10°
Crystal Malt 10°.description: Sweet, mild caramel flavor and a golden color. Use in light lagers and light ales.

Crystal Malt 30°.name: Crystal Malt 30°
Crystal Malt 30°.description: Sweet, mild caramel flavor and a golden color. Use in light lagers and light ales.

6-row Pale Malt.name: 6-row Pale Malt
6-row Pale Malt.description: Moderate malt flavor. Basic malt for all beer styles.

Special Roast.name: Special Roast
Special Roast.description: Provides a deep golden to brown color for ales. Use in all darker ales.

Wheat Malt.name: Wheat Malt
Wheat Malt.description: Light flavor and creamy head. For American weizenbier, weissbier and dunkelweiss.

Chocolate Malt.name: Chocolate Malt
Chocolate Malt.description: Use in all types to adjust color and add nutty, toasted flavor. Chocolate flavor.

Roasted Barley.name: Roasted Barley
Roasted Barley.description: Sweet, grainy, coffee flavor and a red to deep brown color. For porters and stouts.

Crystal Malt 40°.name: Crystal Malt 40°
Crystal Malt 40°.description: Sweet, mild caramel flavor and a golden color. Use in light lagers and light ales.

Crystal Malt 20°.name: Crystal Malt 20°
Crystal Malt 20°.description: Sweet, mild caramel flavor and a golden color. Use in light lagers and light ales.

Crystal Malt 60°.name: Crystal Malt 60°
Crystal Malt 60°.description: Sweet caramel flavor, deep golden to red color. For dark amber and brown ales.

Crystal Malt 90°.name: Crystal Malt 90°
Crystal Malt 90°.description: Pronounced caramel flavor and a red color. For stouts, porters and black beers.

Crystal Malt 80°.name: Crystal Malt 80°
Crystal Malt 80°.description: Sweet, smooth caramel flavor and a red to deep red color. For porters, old ales.

Munich Malt.name: Munich Malt
Munich Malt.description: Sweet, toasted flavor and aroma. For Oktoberfests and malty styles.

Black Patent Malt.name: Black Patent Malt
Black Patent Malt.description: Provides color and sharp flavor in stouts and porters.

2-row Pale Malt.name: 2-row Pale Malt
2-row Pale Malt.description: Smooth, less grainy, moderate malt flavor. Basic malt for all beer styles.

Crystal Malt 120°.name: Crystal Malt 120°
Crystal Malt 120°.description: Pronounced caramel flavor and a red color. For stouts, porters and black beers.
